_comment: Example email configuration for USD Rate Scraper
_note: Copy this to ~/.usd_scraper.cfg and update with your settings
_security: Passwords are never saved - you'll be prompted each time

mailtrap.notes: Best for testing - emails are captured, not sent

gmail: 1. Enable 2-Factor Authentication on your Google account
2. Go to Account Settings > Security > App passwords
4. Use the app password (not your regular password) in the scraper
mailtrap: 1. Sign up at https://mailtrap.io (free tier available)
2. Create an inbox and get SMTP credentials
3. Use the provided username and password
4. All emails are captured for testing - nothing is actually sent
